keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes SNP's education policy, supports investing in schools.
Supports mental health, opposes Conservative health policy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Christine can win, SNP can be beaten here.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposes hard Brexit, supports staying in single market.
issues.education: Wants to reverse SNP education cuts, invest in children's future.
issues.health: Wants to put mental health care on an equal footing with physical health.

leaflet.personalStatement: Christine has lived in Edinburgh for 25 years with her family.

endorsements.endorsement: The Guardian has endorsed the Liberal Democrats as the real opposition to the Conservative Brexit government and the only party which is standing up for liberal values for Britain.

quotes.text: This general election is your chance to change the direction of our country.
quotes.source: Tim Farron, Leader of the Liberal Democrats

images.caption: Photographs of Christine Jardine and supporters

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet argues that SNP can be defeated in this constituency, and Christine Jardine is presented as the viable candidate to accomplish this.
